member.name: T:StockSharp.Algo.Strategies.Protective.AutoProtectiveStrategy
member.summary: The strategy of the automatic position protection.
member.remarks: New trades come in strategy via . They are automatically protected by . Also, turns over stops in case of position flipping.

member.name: M:StockSharp.Algo.Strategies.Protective.AutoProtectiveStrategy.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the .

member.name: P:StockSharp.Algo.Strategies.Protective.AutoProtectiveStrategy.TakeProfitLevel
member.summary: The protective level for the take profit. The default level is 0, which means the disabled.

member.name: P:StockSharp.Algo.Strategies.Protective.AutoProtectiveStrategy.StopLossLevel
member.summary: The protective level for the stop loss. The default level is 0, which means the disabled.

member.name: P:StockSharp.Algo.Strategies.Protective.AutoProtectiveStrategy.IsTrailingStopLoss
member.summary: Whether to use a trailing technique for . The default is off.

member.name: P:StockSharp.Algo.Strategies.Protective.AutoProtectiveStrategy.IsTrailingTakeProfit
member.summary: Whether to use a trailing technique for . The default is off.

member.name: P:StockSharp.Algo.Strategies.Protective.AutoProtectiveStrategy.StopLossTimeOut
member.summary: Time limit for . If protection has not worked by this time, the position will be closed on the market. The default is off.

member.name: P:StockSharp.Algo.Strategies.Protective.AutoProtectiveStrategy.TakeProfitTimeOut
member.summary: Time limit for . If protection has not worked by this time, the position will be closed on the market. The default is off.

member.summary: To get or set the initial position for the instrument.

member.summary: The strategy which new trades are automatically passed to .

member.summary: To protect the position that has been updated via .

member.name: P:StockSharp.Algo.Strategies.Protective.ProtectiveStrategy.IsTrailing
member.summary: Whether to use a trailing technique. For the with profit increasing the level of profit taking is automatically increased. For the with profit increasing the level of loss protection is automatically increased. The default is disabled.

member.summary: The absolute value of the price when the one is reached the protective strategy is activated.
member.remarks: If the price is equal to then the activation is not required.
